definition: choline esterase (ChE), hydrolyzing enzyme in blood plasma
gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

sentences.english: Certain drugs and chemicals also have been shown to decrease the activity of pseudocholine esterase.
sentences.chinese: 有些药物和化学制品也表明能降低拟胆碱酯酶的活性。

sentences.english: The poisoning rebound time of all cases occurred in the decrease period of cholinesterase activity.
sentences.chinese: 中毒反跳发生的时间均在胆碱酯酶活性下降的时期内。

sentences.english: Effects of the anticholinesterase agent may be antagonized .
sentences.chinese: 胆碱酯酶剂的效果可能被对抗。

sentences.english: There were plenty of AChE positive fiber in hippocampus and corpus mamillare.
sentences.chinese: 海马结构内含有大量胆碱酯酶阳性染色纤维。

sentences.english: Dipterex is an organophosphorus insecticide, characterized by its anticholinesterase property.
sentences.chinese: 敌百虫是有机磷杀虫剂，又是胆碱酯酶抑制剂。

sentences.english: A cholinesterase inhibitor (ChEI) and immunosuppressive therapy were applied for treatment.
sentences.chinese: 一种胆碱酯酶抑制剂和免疫抑制疗法用于治疗。

sentences.english: The enzyme cholinesterase is important in the transmission of nerve impulses .
sentences.chinese: 胆碱酯酶在神经刺激的传导中起着重要作用。

sentences.english: Anti-cholinesterase, such as pyridostigmine was used to control the MG symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 疗中应用抗胆碱酯酶药物控制肌无力症状。

definition: esterase, enzyme that breaks up esters by hydrolysis
acetylcholine ACh (amine related to vitamin B complex)
